How many people are affected by hereditary angioedema ?,"Hereditary angioedema is estimated to affect 1 in 50,000 people. Type I is the most common, accounting for 85 percent of cases. Type II occurs in 15 percent of cases, and type III is very rare.",GHR,hereditary angioedema
